known_issues: Request to revert the add-control button to the last known working version (regression suspected).

existing_features.title: Restore the “Add Control” button behavior to the last known working state so that, when the panel is in Edit mode and the control layout is initialized (and not loading), clicking the button reliably opens the Add Control modal (both in the header and in the Import/Export panel “Versions” tab).

Revert/repair the Add Control button’s disabled/loading UX so it matches the last working version: the button is disabled when not allowed to add controls, shows a loading spinner while the layout is loading, and displays a visible tooltip explaining why it is disabled (e.g., runtime mode, initializing, loading).

projectName: Revert Add Control button behavior to last known working state
